original: You're a wonderful friend.
translated: Tu es une merveilleuse amie.

original: The magician Sarah. Apparently people call her "The Great Mage" or some such.
translated: La magicienne Sarah. Apparemment, certains l'appellent "La grande Mage" ou quelque chose comme ça.

original: I've made lots of friends.

original: Where did you go for spring break?

original: We stood at the door and waited.

original: Linda developed a close-knit relationship with Dan's children.
translated: Linda a établi une relation très soudée avec les enfants de Dan.

original: Where were you when your wife disappeared, Tom?

original: They won't waste time.

original: I don't wholly agree with you.

original: No one is sure how many people died.

original: I got sleepy.

original: I just didn't know how.

original: When I opened the door, I found her naked, stretched on the sofa.
translated: En ouvrant la porte, je l'ai découverte, nue, allongée sur le divan.

original: I do not like the rich.

translated: Bien que j'eusse presque instinctivement conçu du ressentiment du fait que mon employeur m'avait placé en observation, après mon erreur, je surmontai bientôt mon animosité à son égard et, au lieu de nourrir une rancune, je me résolus à prendre toute l'affaire pour une nécessaire expérience d'apprentissage.

original: This is the person I talked about the other day.

original: I will go if you go.

original: We invited him to our house.

original: I share your feelings.

original: Do you see it?
translated: Est-ce que tu le vois ?

original: We all agreed with Tom.
translated: Nous étions tous d'accord avec Tom.

original: You have some books.
translated: Vous avez quelques livres.

original: It was her decision.
translated: C'était son choix.

original: We've reached the peak.
translated: Nous avons atteint la cime.

original: Many big projects will be completed in the 21st century.
translated: De nombreux grands projets seront accomplis au vingt-et-unième siècle.

original: Let's eat sushi.
translated: Prenons des sushi.

original: Do you have a copy?
translated: En avez-vous un duplicata ?

original: No one would talk about it.
translated: Personne n'en parlerait.

original: Do you want some more coffee?
translated: Tu veux encore du café ?

original: She's deaf.
translated: Elle est sourde.

original: They were even more interested in his beautiful wife.
translated: Ils furent encore plus intéressés par sa belle épouse.

original: Let's go sit in the shade.
translated: Allons nous asseoir à l'ombre.

original: Mother and child are both doing well.
translated: La mère et l'enfant se portent bien.

original: Take care not to catch a cold.
translated: Prenez garde de ne pas contracter un rhume !

original: He came by bus.
translated: Il vint en bus.

original: I have the ace of clubs.
translated: J'ai l'as de trèfle.

original: I thought we were going to crash.
translated: J'ai pensé que nous allions nous écraser.

original: Those who have a long hair own a blow-dryer.
translated: Ceux qui ont les cheveux longs possèdent un sèche-cheveux.

original: Close the door, please.
translated: Ferme la porte, je te prie.

original: She unbuckled her belt.
translated: Elle a débouclé sa ceinture.

original: This time I'll let it slide.
translated: Je vais fermer les yeux pour cette fois.

original: Professor Hiroshi Ishiguro of Osaka University invented a telenoid which could replace mobile phones in the future.
translated: Le Professeur Hiroshi Ishiguro de l'université d'Osaka a inventé un télénoïde qui pourrait remplacer les téléphones portables dans le futur.

original: Tom never should've been fired.
translated: Tom n'aurait jamais dû être viré.

original: That lady appears rich.
translated: Cette femme semble riche.

original: This is preposterous.
translated: C'est absurde.

original: Let's do something different this afternoon.
translated: Faisons quelque chose de différent, cette après-midi !

original: There are too many people in this room.
translated: Il y a trop de gens dans cette pièce.

original: I don't like who you've become.
translated: Je n'aime pas ce que vous êtes devenues.

original: At last, they reached the top of the mountain.
translated: Ils finirent par atteindre le sommet de la montagne.

original: Tom was at a loss how to express himself.
translated: Tom ne savait de quelle façon s'exprimer.

original: The thieves opened the door with a pass key.
translated: Les voleurs ont ouvert la porte avec un passe-partout.

original: I know where you dwell.
translated: Je sais où vous résidez.

original: I saw cats mating in the street.
translated: J'ai vu des chats en train de s'accoupler dans la rue.

original: Promise me that you won't sell your guitar to anyone but me.
translated: Promets-moi que tu ne vendras ta guitare à personne d'autre que moi.

original: Mary hates Tom, but not as much as he hates her.
translated: Marie déteste Tom, mais pas autant qu'il la déteste.

original: Give me a sec.
translated: Donnez-moi une seconde.

original: I bought the novel on which the film is based.
translated: J'ai acheté le roman d'après lequel le film fut adapté.

original: We're going to have an examination in English tomorrow.
translated: Demain nous allons avoir une interrogation en anglais.

original: Tom and Mary began dancing.
translated: Tom et Mary commencèrent à danser.

original: I read a newspaper while eating.
translated: Je lis un journal pendant que je mange.

original: She stretched to relieve the stiffness in her back.
translated: Elle s'étira pour soulager la raideur de son dos.

original: While some say it will take only minutes, others suspect it could take months.
translated: Tandis que certains disent que ça ne durera que quelques minutes, d'autres pressentent que ça peut durer des mois.

original: Can you point me in the right direction?
translated: Pouvez-vous m'indiquer la bonne direction ?

original: Everybody is drinking, and nearly everybody is smoking.
translated: Tout le monde boit, et presque tout le monde fume.

original: She does all her children's wishes.
translated: Elle réalise tous les vœux de ses enfants.

original: I can get you out of prison.
translated: Je peux te sortir de prison.

original: How many pages are there in this book?
translated: Combien y a-t-il de pages dans ce livre ?

original: I'm going to go to the doctor this afternoon.
translated: Je vais chez le médecin, cet après-midi.

original: Tell me where you've been.
translated: Dis-moi où tu étais.

original: Hand in your homework by next Monday.
translated: Remettez vos devoirs pour lundi prochain.

original: I can't make that decision for you.
translated: Je ne peux pas prendre cette décision pour vous.

original: Am I supposed to thank you?
translated: Suis-je supposée te remercier ?

original: How's this possible?
translated: Comment est-ce possible ?

original: I study art history.
translated: J'étudie l'histoire de l'art.

original: Time is wasting.
translated: Le temps se perd.

original: Tom contacted Mary.
translated: Tom a contacté Marie.

original: Let's go to Shinjuku tomorrow.
translated: Allons à Shinjuku demain matin.

original: His book inspired me.
translated: Son livre m'inspira.

original: What did you do after dinner?
translated: Qu'est-ce que vous avez fait après le dîner ?

original: Everyone's laughing, but no one will explain to me what happened.
translated: Tout le monde rit, mais personne ne m'explique ce qui s'est passé.

original: This camera is Tom's favorite.
translated: Cet appareil photo est le favori de Tom.

original: I like watching movies in French.
translated: J'aime regarder des films en français.

original: What are we?
translated: Que sommes-nous ?

original: I feel like dancing.
translated: J'ai envie de danser.

original: You're in no position to bargain.
translated: Tu n'es pas en position de négocier.

original: That is a criminal offense, and you will surely be punished!
translated: C'est un acte criminel et tu seras sûrement puni pour cela !

original: It rained during the whole meeting.
translated: Il a plu durant toute la réunion.

original: She is working night and day.
translated: Elle travaille nuit et jour.

original: Children shouldn't be spoiled.
translated: Les enfants ne devraient pas être gâtés.
